column1: Mm, no. Uh, look, Token, there's some shows in LA we wanna book you on right away. If you come out to my limo we can talk everything through.
Actually, our fountain is two stories tall.
Come on, Token, we have a lot to talk about.
Sorry kids, nature of the business, you know?  Do you like steak, Token? I know a great place for you locally.
